fetch_crypto_pair_price.description: Fetch the current price of a pair (e.g. BTC/USDT)

props.name: first_coin
props.description: The currency to fetch the price for (e.g. 'BTC' in 'BTC/USDT')

props.name: second_coin
props.description: The currency to fetch the price in (e.g. 'USDT' in 'BTC/USDT')
